there's an app for tracking the different phases of the solar eclipse and it used the phone's location and

when to keep logic on the device because oftentimes where the path of totality was was in the middle of a field
somewhere where there was just no reception so it was important that it just used the time on the device to

unnecessary and inefficient to handle all business logic on the phone that's
where our other options come in putting the logic on the server often makes sense for complex calculations or when

then there is the issue of device size from tiny phones to tablets those in
